creditline: Gift of Gerald Ray Nelson and Joanne Hogan Nelson
description: image illustrating "Crooked Man" nursery rhyme; thin, stooped man wearing a tall black wooly cap and knickers, walking with a crooked cane; cat catching a mouse in front of man on path; crooked house in background, ULC, with twisting chimney; restrike, numbered 6/6
inscription:
Inscription

below image, in pencil: [6/6 RESTRIKE - RICHARD HOLZSCHUH]; on back, in pencil: [RH100981]
provenance: The artist; his stepdaughter, Joanie Nelson, Vancouver, WA
title: Crooked Man
